thread.title: World’s new growing MICE market: ACE of MICE Exhibition 2016 in Istanbul, Turkey
thread.title_full: World’s new growing MICE market: ACE of MICE Exhibition 2016 in Istanbul, Turkey

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: World’s new growing MICE market: ACE of MICE Exhibition 2016 in Istanbul, Turkey
text:
World’s new growing MICE market: ACE of MICE Exhibition 2016 in Istanbul, Turkey World’s new growing MICE market: ACE of MICE Exhibition 2016 in Istanbul, Turkey Details Category: Show   11:15 The 3rd edition of ACE of MICE Exhibition will take place at Istanbul Congress Center (ICC) and Lutfi Kırdar Congress Center on March 16-18, 2016. You may find further information about AME 2016 from the link at the end of this article. Organized for the second time this year, “ACE of MICE Exhibition” is the leading regional event for the meetings, incentives, conferences, events and business travel industry, which took place from February 26-28, 2015 in Istanbul, Turkey. 
The event gathered 11,687 industry professionals with over 269 exhibiting companies from 25 countries and 656 high-level hosted buyers from corporations, associations and agencies. At the 3 day show, you will be able to have pre-scheduled B2B meetings with local and international hosted buyers, participate to seminars, networking parties and ACE of MICE Awards Ceremony on March 17, 2016 which is gathering all local industry stakeholders and choosing the best of the year! Statistics from AME 2015 - Total Number of Hosted Buyers: 656 (76% local, 24% international) - Total Number of Visitors: 11.687 - 269 exhibitors (74% local and 26% international) - Total Number of B2B pre-scheduled appointments: 8551 - 24 sessions and 70 speakers - ACE of MICE Awards Ceremony at Zorlu Performing Arts Center Who Are Hosted Buyers?
